googleLanguageR
  • Reference

List languages from Google Translate API

Returns a list of supported languages for translation.

gl_translate_list(target = "en")

Arguments

target

If specified, language names are localized in target langauge

Value

data.frame of supported languages

Details

Supported language codes, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier. (E.g. 'en', 'ja'). In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language + region identifiers are returned (e.g. 'zh-TW', 'zh-CH')

See also

https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/reference/languages

Other translations: gl_translate_detect, gl_translate_language
